statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Shamorie Ponds hit seven 3-pointers, finished with 26 points and nine assists -- all career highs as St. John's cruised to a 90-62 win over Fordham on Thursday night.
article.headline: Ponds' career night lifts St John's over Fordham 90-62
article.linkText: Ponds' career night lifts St John's over Fordham 90-62
article.story:
NEW YORK -- Shamorie Ponds hit seven 3-pointers, finished with 26 points and nine assists -- all career highs -- and Federico Mussini scored 20 points on 7-of-9 shooting as St. John's cruised to a 90-62 win over Fordham on Thursday night.

Ponds made 9 of 13 from the field, including 7-of-11 3-pointers, and had seven rebounds and four steals. Bashir Ahmed added 11 points and Tariq Owens scored 10.

Ahmed had a dunk, Ponds hit a 3 and Mussini converted a 3-point play with one second on the clock and St. John's (5-5) led 42-33 at the half. Owens' jumper to open the second-half scoring pushed the lead into double figures for good and started a 13-5 run that made it 57-38 with 15 minutes to go. Ponds hit two more 3-pointers -- converting a 4-point play on the first -- over that span.

Chris Sengfelder had 20 points, including a career-high six 3s, for Fordham (5-5). The Rams shot 29.6 percent from the field after halftime.
